install.name: Upcoming Events
install.author: Mark Lee
install.description: Displays recent events from the site

param.name: customCache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module.

param.name: total
param.label: Total Events
param.description: Total number of events to be displayed within the module

param.name: tipslength
param.label: Description Length
param.description: Set the length for the description in tooltips

param.name: type
param.label: Include Group Events
param.description: Select whether to include group events as well.

param.name: past
param.label: Show Past Events
param.description: Select whether to include past events as well.
